abstract: China’s biggest search engine company said acquiring the Internet video business of PPStream would provide more television shows and movies for users and expand its offerings for advertisers.
snippet: China’s biggest search engine company said acquiring the Internet video business of PPStream would provide more television shows and movies for users and expand its offerings for advertisers.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG – Baidu, China’s biggest search engine company, announced on Tuesday that it would pay $370 million for the online video business of PPStream.

headline.main: China’s Baidu to Pay $370 Million for Internet Video Business
